title: Epidemic of the Undead_ A Zombie Novel (P. A. Douglas)
description:
When the dead suddenly decide to not stay dead, this unexplained epidemic turns the world upside down overnight causing everything to come to a grinding halt. 
For Chris Commons and his folk band of friends, tour is definitely canceled.
No more shows!
Several States away from his family, Chris struggles to keep his sanity while hoping to make his way back home. After the sudden death and resurrection of his cousin and fellow band mate, Chris changes gears eager to simply just stay alive!
Genre: Science Fiction
